document_data.name: Sendai
document_data.mainbody: '''Sendai''' was a [[drow]] female [[Bhaalspawn]] and one of "the Five".
document_data.Possessions: Sendai fought with an enchanted drow flail and shield. [[Wong Fei's ioun stone|''Wong Fei's ioun stone'']], a unique piece of magical equipment, orbited around her head. She donned [[Bladesinger Chain|''Bladesinger Chain'']] and used a [[Wand of Cursing|''Wand of Cursing'']]. In her inventory, she also had a [[potion of healing|potion of superior healing]] and an incredibly highly enchanted set of armor, the [[Studded Leather Armor of Thorns|''Studded Leather Armor of Thorns'']].

History.The Echo:
[[File:Murder tribunal.png|thumb|''Amelyssan, Illasera, and Sendai, with Sarevok on the Tribunal's throne.''|450x450px]]
In the late 15{{th}} century DR, a collection of Bhaalspawn: [[Amelyssan]], [[Abazigal]], [[Illasera]], and Sendai herself, were brought back as bloodied echoes of their former selves by their fellow Bhaalspawn [[Sarevok Anchev]], placing them on the [[Murder Tribunal]], hidden deep within [[Baldur's Gate]]'s [[Undercellar]], in the ruins of the [[Temple of Bhaal (Undercity)|Temple of Bhaal]].
